__e: The trouble with being a vampire is you have to be invited in, to go in.

Well, you can have it, all of it, because that's what being a vampire's all about.
And your daddy is a vampire with a soul.
Well, that's the vampire I can make a deal with.
He is a vampire at the very height of his power, and every second, he grows stronger.
But I hope it's not about that new vampire story.
I mean, I've never seen a real vampire in my whole life, much less a slayed one.
I think it's been pretty well established that I'm not an actual vampire.

So, I was thinking, we don't have to kill the vampire, do we?
And you're not a vampire, so you can't tell me what to do.
There's no way that any self-respecting vampire would ever live in a place like that.
